sentences.en: " Want to piss ? The urinal's under the bed. "
All right, seriously, you're starting to piss me off now.
sentences.cn: 好的, 说真得, 你该从我身边滚开了.

sentences.en: And that goddamn pup tent smells like cat piss or worse.
sentences.cn: 那个该死的小帐篷就跟猫尿一样臭,比猫尿还臭.

sentences.en: Barbra Streisand : I'm not talking to you, you piss - ant little hick!
sentences.cn: 我没跟你说话, 你这个一文不值的小乡巴佬!

sentences.en: Don't forget to piss on all the corners before you leave.
sentences.cn: 在你离开之前不要忘记亵渎所有的绝境.

sentences.en: Every time the new teacher appears in a classroom he gets the piss taken out of him.
sentences.cn: 这位新教师每次在教室露面,都要受到一番嘲弄.

sentences.en: He told me to piss off, or clobber me.
sentences.cn: 他叫我滚开, 不然就要揍我了.

sentences.en: He was fully clothed and covered in puke and piss.
However you took it, I want you to know I didn't mean to piss you off.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样, 我想让你知道我不是想吓跑你.

sentences.en: I won't piss that away because you're higher than a kite.
sentences.cn: 我不想再计较什么了.你是如此的到了极点.

sentences.en: Right now Sean is upstairs sleeping in last night's piss.
sentences.cn: 刚才肖恩在楼上睡在昨天尿过的床上.

sentences.en: So you know that they were trying to piss on your rug?
sentences.cn: 你知道他们想在我的地毯上撒尿?

sentences.en: What did he say to piss you off?

words.tran_cn: 难事；小便的人；淘气男孩
撒尿；下大雨（piss的过去分词）

phrases.phrase: not have a pot to piss in
